definition: ridiculous self-importance (idiom); arrogance
absurd/fantastic/presumptuous/rash
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]

sentences.english: His unexpected failure punctured his self-importance.
sentences.chinese: 他的妄自尊大突然間因這次意想不到的失利而被損傷。
那妄自尊大的婊子是誰啊？

sentences.english: It is too proud of her to apologise.
sentences.chinese: 她太妄自尊大了不可能道歉。

sentences.english: This kind of megalomania combined with his militant message will ultimately lead to violence.
sentences.chinese: 這種妄自尊大，連同其好戰的訊息最終導致暴力。

definition: to think of oneself as terrific (idiom); arrogant
arrogant and conceited
lit. Yelang thinks highly of itself (idiom)/fig. foolish conceit
arrogant
to be unduly humble (idiom)/to undervalue oneself
to think too much of oneself/self-important/arrogant
the eye can see nothing worthwhile all around (idiom); arrogant/condescending/supercilious
complacent/self-satisfied
to believe oneself infallible (idiom)/to be opinionated
to consider everyone else beneath one (idiom); so arrogant that no-one else matters/condescending/to go about with one's nose in the air
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
headstrong/perverse
obstinate and self-opinionated (idiom)
to be shortsighted
stuck in the old ways (idiom); refusing to acknowledge new ideas/stagnating and conservative
egotistical/arrogant/brassy
